message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $150. It's a fantastic deal, and I'm confident you'll love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Can we meet in the middle?

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we settle on $130? It's a great compromise, and you'll still get an amazing product!
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to pay $115 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?

I understand you're trying to stretch your budget, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet you at $125? It's the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a great deal for both of us!

I really appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm afraid $125 is still a bit too high for me. I'd be willing to pay $110 for the product, which is my absolute limit. Can you meet me at this price?

I understand you're really close to your limit, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm willing to make one final offer: $119. It's the lowest I can go, and I think it's still a great deal for both of us. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'll consider it a done deal!
